monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: This Monster's Max Health and Mana are increased by 12% each.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: Allows the Monster to equip two weapons. Second weapon values are reduced by 50%.

skills.name: Antitoxins
skills.description: At the beginning of each turn, heal a random Debuff from this Monster.

skills.name: Attack Plus
skills.description: Improve Attack rating by 1 (Increases Attack by 26)

skills.name: Boulder Toss
skills.description: 1 x 500% physical damage (earth) ignores 50% of the target's Defense damage reduction value, cannot be dodged

skills.name: Bounty
skills.description: This Monster gets 2 random Buffs when an enemy Monster is knocked out.

skills.name: Buffing Heal
skills.description: When applying a Buff, also heal the target by 50% of this Monster's Magic.

skills.name: Cleanse
skills.description: Every hit has a 25% chance to remove a Buff from the target.

skills.name: Crit Chance Focus
skills.description: Critical Chance values from equipment increased by 25%.

skills.name: Crit Chance Plus
skills.description: +5% Critical Chance

skills.name: Crit Damage Plus
skills.description: +15% Critical Damage

skills.name: Critical Ground
skills.description: Earth attacks have 10% increased Critical Chance.

skills.name: Critical Hybridization
skills.description: The first critical hit of a physical attack triggers an additional hit equal to 60% of Magic value and vice versa.

skills.name: Critical Mass
skills.description: 50% chance to gain a random Buff when landing a Critical Hit.

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 37)

skills.name: Dual Wield
skills.description: Allows the Monster to equip two weapons. Second weapon values are reduced by 50%.

skills.name: Earthquake
skills.description: 1 x 165% physical damage (earth) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Earthquake Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 100% (200%) physical damage (earth) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Earthquake Lvl 3
skills.description: 3 x 85% (255%) physical damage (earth) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Eternal Heart
skills.description: This Monster's Max Health and Mana are increased by 12% each.

skills.name: Fatal Cut
skills.description: 2 x 160% (320%) physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt, applies a stack of Wound.

skills.name: Gemstone Barrage
skills.description: 3 x 100% (300%) magical damage (earth) Hits all enemies Applies Regeneration (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Goblin Provisions
skills.description: Aura: Heal all Goblins in the party by 10% of their own Max Health at the start of every turn and apply a random buff.

skills.name: Heal Mastery
skills.description: Healing skills (active and passive) are increased by 20%.

skills.name: Health Focus
skills.description: Health values from equipment increased by 25%.

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 333)

skills.name: Health Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 5% of Max Health.

skills.name: Heroic Defense
skills.description: Reduces damage taken by 2% for every Buff on this Monster.

skills.name: Heroism
skills.description: Deals 2% increased damage for every Buff on this Monster.

skills.name: Hybrid Shield
skills.description: At the start of combat, apply a Shield equal to 100% of Attack and Magic value.

skills.name: Improved Assault
skills.description: Aura: Every Monster in the party deals 3% increased damage for each Might, Sorcery and Glory Buff on them.

skills.name: Jewel Blast
skills.description: 3 x 95% (285%) magical damage (earth) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Jewel Blast Lvl 2
skills.description: 3 x 120% (360%) magical damage (earth) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Jewel Blast Lvl 3
skills.description: 4 x 110% (440%) magical damage (earth) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Life Overload
skills.description: Increase Attack and Magic by 1.5% of this Monster's Max Health.

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Magical Resistance
skills.description: Magical damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Mana Focus
skills.description: Mana and Mana Regeneration values from equipment increased by 25%.

skills.name: Mana Overload
skills.description: Increase Attack and Magic by 15% of this Monster's Max Mana.

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Mana Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 50% of Max Mana.

skills.name: Mass Protector
skills.description: Aura: All Monsters in the party receive 15% less damage from Multi-Target-Attacks.

skills.name: Might
skills.description: Applies Might (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Mud Cannon
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) magical damage (earth)

skills.name: Mud Cannon Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 55% (220%) magical damage (earth)

skills.name: Mud Cannon Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 60% (300%) magical damage (earth)

skills.name: Mud Cannon Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 75% (375%) magical damage (earth)

skills.name: Mud Cannon Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 80% (480%) magical damage (earth)

skills.name: Multi Might
skills.description: Aura: Might (Buff) can be stacked two additional times. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Multi Sorcery
skills.description: Aura: Sorcery (Buff) can be stacked two additional times. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Physical Weakness
skills.description: Physical damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Power
skills.description: Applies Might (Buff) to whole party Applies Sorcery (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Power Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Might (Buff) to whole party Applies Sorcery (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Power Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Might & Sorcery (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Revive
skills.description: Revives target Heal target for 5 x (50 + 15% Magic)

skills.name: Revive Lvl 2
skills.description: Revives target Heal target for 6 x (75 + 15% Magic)

skills.name: Revive Lvl 3
skills.description: Revives target Heal target for 6 x (125 + 25% Magic)

skills.name: Severe Cuts
skills.description: 6 x 65% (390%) physical damage (neutral) applies a stack of Wound.

skills.name: Severe Cuts Lvl 2
skills.description: 6 x 80% (480%) physical damage (neutral) applies a stack of Wound.

skills.name: Slash
skills.description: 1 x 210% physical damage (neutral) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Slash Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 120% (240%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Slash Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 155% (310%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Slash Lvl 4
skills.description: 3 x 125% (375%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Slash Lvl 5
skills.description: 3 x 155% (465%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Stone Rain
skills.description: 3 x 65% (195%) physical damage (earth)

skills.name: Stone Rain Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 60% (240%) physical damage (earth)

skills.name: Stone Rain Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 55% (275%) physical damage (earth)

skills.name: Stone Rain Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 60% (360%) physical damage (earth)

skills.name: Stone Rain Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 80% (480%) physical damage (earth)

skills.name: Strike Mastery
skills.description: This monster can receive an additional Stack of Might, Sorcery and Sidekick. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Weaken
skills.description: Every hit has a 10% chance to apply Weakness.

drops.name: Level Badge
drops.description: Increases Monster level by 1. Can be used on monsters that are at least 2 levels below your highest monster.
